list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: strike the palms of (one's hands) together repeatedly, typically in order to applaud someone or something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Agnes clapped her hands in glee

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: slap (someone) encouragingly on the back or shoulder.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: as they parted, he clapped Owen on the back
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khi họ chia tay, anh vỗ vào lưng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of striking together the palms of the hands, either once or repeatedly.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: when they stop I give them a clap
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khi họ dừng tôi cho họ một vỗ tay

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an explosive sound, especially of thunder.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a clap of thunder echoed through the valley
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một tiếng sấm sét vang vọng qua thung lũng

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she has given him the clap
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy đã cho anh ấy vỗ tay
